text: «Gè yɛni wɛlɛzu, masa kpɔkpɔgiti ti ʋilɛ, Kɛwola Wɔlɔi7:9 Kɛwola Wɔlɔi: Niima wooi ɠa wosu, é lo GALA ɓɔɠɔi ʋa. ʋaani, é zei. Seɠe ɠolegi ɠɛni kɔba, koleai eɠɛ kobe kolegi, ta nɔundeɠai ɠoleai eɠɛ baala deɠa ɠole pepegi. Ná-masa kpɔkpɔgi ɠɛni eɠɛ abuzogi, kɔɠɔiti kiliɠiligai eɠɛ wotolo ɠɔɠɔi, ti ɠɛ eɠɛ abu ɠɛzɛi.
